original_title: UFC on ESPN 3: Ngannou vs Dos Santos
overview: UFC on ESPN 3: Ngannou vs. dos Santos was a mixed martial arts event produced by the Ultimate Fighting Championship that was held on June 29, 2019, at Target Center in Minneapolis, Minnesota, USA. A heavyweight bout between the former UFC Heavyweight Champion Junior dos Santos and former title challenger Francis Ngannou was the event headliner.
title: UFC on ESPN 3: Ngannou vs Dos Santos
